MonsterTrait.Name: Amphibious
MonsterTrait.Text: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

MonsterTrait.Name: Poison Strike (3/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 (2d8) poison damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
Pharblex is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:
• Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, poison spray • 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, healing word, thunderwave • 2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, beast sense, spike growth • 3rd level (3 slots): plant growth, water walk

MonsterTrait.Name: Standing Leap
MonsterTrait.Text: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

MonsterTrait.Name: Swamp Camouflage
MonsterTrait.Text: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Spear
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit. reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
